experience.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
bullets: Built full-stack web flows for CV-based medical tests (capture → inference → results).
Implemented backend APIs/pipelines to run CV inference and return structured outputs.

experience.title: VR Development Intern
bullets: Developed interactive VR/AR experiences in Unity, implementing interaction logic, animations, and user interactions.
Integrated and tested immersive hardware (HTC Vive, Microsoft HoloLens) for production workflows.
Implemented object tracking and spatial interaction using Vuforia SDK and VRTK.
